/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, immersed in the city's vibrant atmosphere. The street is lined with tall buildings, their facades adorned with various advertisements and billboards, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars and buses are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active transportation system. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the greenery of the trees lining the street. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
